reason: Mixed regulatory signals create uncertainty. While the SEC's dismissal of the Gemini lawsuit offers some relief and removes a specific regulatory cloud, ongoing legislative efforts (Senate draft) and negative narratives (FBI arrest, stablecoin usage statistics) are likely to cap upside potential. This environment suggests a period of consolidation as the market digests these conflicting inputs, warranting a cautious 'WATCH' approach due to persistent regulatory flux and reputational concerns.
headlines: Senate Agriculture's crypto market structure draft peppered with Democrat pitches
SEC dismisses lawsuit against billionaire Winklevoss twins-backed Gemini over Earn product
FBI arrests ex-Olympian drug 'kingpin' who allegedly used crypto to move proceeds
Stablecoins moved $35 trillion last year but only 1% of it was for 'real world' payments
U.S. Senator Warren rebuffed on delay of World Liberty bank charter over Trump ties
